AMPS GRIB file metadata

GRIB format metadata from the Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) files.

Format

amps_metadata A data frame with 8 columns. The columns represent

Band the band number
GRIB_COMMENT the data measured
GRIB_ELEMENT the data name
GRIB_FORECAST_SECONDS forecast seconds
GRIB_REF_TIME text reference time
GRIB_SHORT_NAME short name
GRIB_UNIT text unit
GRIB_VALID_TIME text valid time

Examples

print(amps_metadata)
#> # A tibble: 254 x 8
#>     Band           GRIB_COMMENT GRIB_ELEMENT GRIB_FORECAST_SECONDS
#>    <chr>                  <chr>        <chr>                 <chr>
#>  1     1           undefined[-]       var176                  0sec
#>  2     2           undefined[-]       var177                  0sec
#>  3     3           Icecover(ice         ICEC                  0sec
#>  4     4         Landcover(land         LAND                  0sec
#>  5     5 u-componentofwind[m/s]         UGRD                  0sec
#>  6     6 u-componentofwind[m/s]         UGRD                  0sec
#>  7     7 u-componentofwind[m/s]         UGRD                  0sec
#>  8     8 u-componentofwind[m/s]         UGRD                  0sec
#>  9     9 u-componentofwind[m/s]         UGRD                  0sec
#> 10    10 u-componentofwind[m/s]         UGRD                  0sec
#> # ... with 244 more rows, and 4 more variables: GRIB_REF_TIME <chr>,
#> #   GRIB_SHORT_NAME <chr>, GRIB_UNIT <chr>, GRIB_VALID_TIME <chr>
